column5: Ahhhhh.  Much better now.     Thanks HHM
shoot, I spent 10 minutes trying to get the poor little guy out of there!

I'm on dial-up so I can't even watch the video I'm guessing it's just a fun joke but a simple 60% of water and  40% of rubbing alcohol solution works perfect with a soft cloth used lightly to clean your lcds for anyone wondering.
LOL....my 5 yr old daughter sat here and laughed and stared for 10 minutes straight....thanks for this link.
I keep thinking of the "alien" from MIB. I'll have to show the kids tomorrow.
